glbUrl.title: GLB URL
glbUrl.description: Public URL of the GLB file to convert (use either glbUrl or glbBase64, not both)

glbBase64.title: GLB Base64
glbBase64.description: Base64-encoded GLB file content (use when you don't have a public URL)

outputFileName.title: Output file name
outputFileName.description: Name for the output USDZ file (without extension). Default: 'output'
